item.description: March 5,6,7 Friday, Saturday, Sunday. Come one or both nights! Bring your bathing suit to swim in the salt water pool. We have nothing but fun and games on the agenda for this women-only weekend! Be sure to book your rooms as soon as possible at the Holiday Inn, Mansfield. Call 508-339-2200, and be sure to mention Women On Wheels to get the SPECIAL DISCOUNT of only $89 per night - no matter how many people are in your room!
item.name: WOW-WOW
